meanings.definition: A bound state of an electron and an electron hole which are attracted to each other by the electrostatic Coulomb force.
meanings.sent1: Excitons can be found in semiconductors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study excitons to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The excitons in the material were having a dance party!
meanings.sent4: The excitons danced around each other like old friends reuniting.
meanings.sent5: Imagine excitons as tiny, charged dance partners moving in harmony.
